#SETUP: ConsistentOneColumnTableResult,NumberIsFloat

// powers of 2 for exact representation in float (2^135 / 2^83 = 2^52) and will overflow decimal math
>> 43556142965880123323311949751266331066368 / 9671406556917033397649408 
4503599627370496

// no remainder with no fuzzy comparison
>> Mod( 43556142965880123323311949751266331066368, 9671406556917033397649408 ) = 0
true

>> Mod([43556142965880123323311949751266331066368, 87112285931760246646623899502532662132736],3000000000)
Table({Value:2331066368},{Value:1662132736})

>> Mod([1.000000000000000001,2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], 2.000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:1},{Value:0},{Value:1})

>> Mod([Float(1.000000000000000001),2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], 2.000000000000000000001)
Table({Value:1},{Value:0},{Value:1})

>> Mod([1.000000000000000001,2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], Float(2.000000000000000000001))
Table({Value:1},{Value:0},{Value:1})

>> Mod([Float(1.000000000000000001),2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], Float(2.000000000000000000001))
Table({Value:1},{Value:0},{Value:1})

>> Mod([1.000000000000000001,2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], [2.000000000000000000001, 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:1},{Value:0.5},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.NotApplicable})})

>> Mod([Float(1.000000000000000001),2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], [2.000000000000000000001, 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:1},{Value:0.5},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.NotApplicable})})

>> Mod([1.000000000000000001,2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], [Float(2.000000000000000000001), 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:1},{Value:0.5},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.NotApplicable})})

>> Mod([Float(1.000000000000000001),2.0000000000000002,3.00000000000000000003], [Float(2.000000000000000000001), 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:1},{Value:0.5},{Value:Error({Kind:ErrorKind.NotApplicable})})

>> Mod(2.0000000000000002, [2.000000000000000000001, 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:0},{Value:0.5})

>> Mod(Float(2.0000000000000002), [2.000000000000000000001, 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:0},{Value:0.5})

>> Mod(2.0000000000000002, [Float(2.000000000000000000001), 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:0},{Value:0.5})

>> Mod(Float(2.0000000000000002), [Float(2.000000000000000000001), 1.50000000000000000001])
Table({Value:0},{Value:0.5})

>> Round( Mod([1,2,3,4,5,6], [0.3,0.3,0.3,0.3,0.3,0.3]), 1 )
Table({Value:0.1},{Value:0.2},{Value:0},{Value:0.1},{Value:0.2},{Value:0})
